title: Binance-induced market rout wipes more than $200M from crypto traders
description:
Events of the last 24 hours involving crypto exchange Binance and several U.S. federal agencies, including the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) and the Department of Justice, wiped over $200 million from crypto traders who held positions on the market. CryptoSlate’s data showed that the total market cap of digital assets declined by 2.04% to $1.38 […]

The post Binance-induced market rout wipes more than $200M from crypto traders appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong Discusses Binance’s Legal Woes and Crypto Compliance
description: On 21 Nov 2023, Coinbase Co-Founder and CEO Brian Armstrong spoke to CNBC’s Kate Rooney in the aftermath of Binance pleading guilty and agreeing to “pay over $4 billion to resolve the Justice Department’s investigation into violations related to the Bank Secrecy Act (BSA), failure to register as a money transmitting business, and the International […]

title: Lightspark’s CEO David Marcus Recognizes Current Non-Custodial Lightning Network Solutions Imply ‘Some Form of Compromise’
description: David Marcus, co-founder and CEO of Lightspark, an institutional Lightning Network (LN) payment solutions provider, referred to the state of custodial and non-custodial transactions on the network. While Marcus believes that custodial LN for institutions is ready for prime time, he acknowledged that non-custodial usage still implies compromising on some features. Lightspark’s David Marcus: Lightning […]

title: Altcoins falling after Binance CEO resigns; 5 crypto alternatives to consider
description: Bitcoin ETF Token (BTCETF), Hedera, TG Casino, TON, and Chainlink are tokens investors can explore following the resignation of Binance Changpeng Zhao

title: Crypto Market Trends: Analysts Favor THORChain (RUNE) and Avalanche (AVAX), Predict Significant Growth for VC Spectra (SPCT)
description: The crypto market is on a downward trend following a break in its recent upsurge. However, crypto analysts view specific top altcoins as ready for investment. title: Investor Brian Kelly Says Bitcoin (BTC) Could Be 10x Higher if It Takes Market Share From Gold
description:
Crypto investor Brian Kelly says that Bitcoin’s (BTC) market cap could soar 10x if investors start preferring the king crypto over gold.
